Points per Level","isGranted":true,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":true,"modifierTypeId":1,"modifierSubTypeId":752,"componentId":374348,"componentTypeId":1088085227,"tagConstraints":[]}],"condition":[]},"classSpells":[{"entityTypeId":1446578651,"characterClassId":136025206,"spells":[{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3095167,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":365405,"definitionKey":"1118725998:365405","name":"Arcane Diagnosis","level":0,"school":"Divination","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Hour","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":15,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Target one willing creature within range and line-of-sight. After 1 minute, the caster learns the target's remaining hit points, death saves, and any diseases, conditions, or ailments afflicting them for the duration. The information appears as a visual chart next to the target creature. This chart also displays an estimated remaining lifespan, unless the creature's remaining lifespan is unpredictable, such as an immortal or ageless being.

\r\n

The caster can only see this information while looking directly at the target of the spell. Casting the spell again dispels the previous effect. The spell's effect can also be dismissed at any time as a free action.

\r\n

Creatures that are not technically alive are not affected by this spell, such as constructs, specters, undead, and aberrations.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"A pinch of Phoenix Ash","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":false,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":false,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":15,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3731693,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":448341,"definitionKey":"1118725998:448341","name":"Drone Worklights","level":0,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Concentration"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You activate up to four magically-powered tiny drones that ascend into the air from where they were stored and hover for the duration.

\r\n

Each drone can emit a dimmable light in any of the following configurations:

\r\n
    \r\n
  • A dimly illuminated 10-foot radius
    • \r\n
  • A well-illuminated 30-foot cone
    • \r\n
  • A spotlight with a 5-foot radius at a range of up to 60 feet
    • \r\n
\r\n

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the drones up to 60 feet to a new spot within range. A drone must be within 20 feet of another drone created by this spell, and a drone powers down if it exceeds the spell's range.

For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear. You also understand any written language that you see, but you must be touching the surface on which the words are written. It takes about 1 minute to read one page of text.

\r\n

This spell doesn't decode secret messages in a text or a glyph, such as an arcane sigil, that isn't part of a written language.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"a pinch of soot and salt","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":false,"isHomebrew":false,"version":null,"sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":224,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Social"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":null,"sources":[{"sourceId":1,"pageNumber":null,"sourceType":2},{"sourceId":2,"pageNumber":224,"sourceType":1}],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":true},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Self","rangeValue":0,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3770750,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":451069,"definitionKey":"1118725998:451069","name":"Hamund's Harvesting Hands","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Until Dispelled"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Target a dead creature within range that has a CR of 3 or less. This spell conjures an invisible pair of hands that harvest a creature for any useful materials as listed in their harvesting table. No ability check is required to harvest these materials, the hands automatically succeed in harvesting them, and then place them next to the creatures carcass. You still need to provide any requisite containers such as vials or bags, but the hands harvest all materials in half the time it would normally take. You may direct the hands to harvest certain materials first. Once all of the creature's useful materials have been harvested, the hands disappear.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the CR of the creature harvestable increases by 3 for each slot level above 1st.

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[2,3],"componentsDescription":"a sharp knife and a pair of gloves","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":12,"dice":null,"value":0,"details":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the CR of the creature harvestable increases by 3 for each slot level above 1st."}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Utility"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":6},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":3342318,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":397085,"definitionKey":"1118725998:397085","name":"Nightshades Necrotic Needle","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You shoot a swirling red-green needle of necrotic energy from the palm of your hand at a foe. Choose one target within range and make a spell attack roll. On a hit the target takes 3d8 necrotic damage and you gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. Being within 5 feet of an enemy does not impose disadvantage on the attack roll of this spell. In addition if you have the target of the spell grappled you gain advantage on the attack roll. 

\r\n

At higher levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st. 

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":2,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":true,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":16,"dice":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":8,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":0,"diceString":"1d8"},"value":null,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Damage"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":30,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":422360,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":40812,"definitionKey":"1118725998:40812","name":"Preserve/Decay","level":1,"school":"Transmutation","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Special"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

School: Chronomancy (Transmutation)
(Intended for use with the Chronomancer subclass)
Duration: Preserve: (1 + spell slot level used) months / caster level up to 10 years ; Decay:1 month / level

\r\n

Preserve:
By the use of the Preserve spell, the caster can halt the decay (including shelf ripening) of any nonliving matter. In the case of food or drink, the substance must first be placed in a closed container of some kind. Preserve is dispelled when the container is unsealed. For other material, the spell runs its full duration unless dispelled by some other means. If the target is a corpse, it must be packaged completely in a container (sack, trunk, etc), and a spell slot of 2nd level or higher must be used.

\r\n

The material component required is a small vial of salt sealed with wax.

\r\n

Decay:
The reverse of this spell, Decay, causes immediate decay equal to one month per caster level.

\r\n

The material component required is a pinch of dung or mold.

\r\n

Based on 2e AD&D spell Preserve, from the Chronomancer suppliment (TSR 9506).

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"A vial of salt sealed with wax OR a bit of dung or mold","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":[],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spelllevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Touch","rangeValue":null,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":739089,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":78319,"definitionKey":"1118725998:78319","name":"Contagious Affliction","level":1,"school":"Necromancy","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

Speaking words of illness and death, you cause a creature's blood to cloud with toxins and their skin to erupt in lesions.  Make a ranged spell attack against one creature within range.  On a hit, the target takes 2d12 poison damage and becomes infected with a contagious affliction.  On a miss the target takes half damage and is not infected.  

\r\n

While the target is infected in this way it is poisoned and it must make a Constitution saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending this effect on a success.  Each time the target fails a saving throw against this effect, it's affliction erupts in a cloud of disease.  This cloud is a sphere with a radius of 10ft centered on the target, and each creature within this sphere when the target fails its saving throw takes 1d6 poison damage.  

\r\n

This affliction counts as a disease, and can be removed with a Lesser Restoration spell or similar magic.  Undead and constructs are immune to the effects of this spell.  

\r\n

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial poison damage increases by 1d12 for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the poisonous eruptions increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.  Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target takes a -1 penalty to saving throws made against the effects of this spell.  This penalty increases to -2 for a spell slot of 5th level or higher,  -3 for a slot of 7th level or higher, and -4 for a 9th level spell slot.  

","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":false,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2],"componentsDescription":"","saveDcAbilityId":3,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"1","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":true,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[{"fixedValue":null,"id":"spell_78319_55689","entityId":null,"entityTypeId":null,"type":"damage","subType":"poison","dice":null,"restriction":"","statId":null,"requiresAttunement":false,"duration":null,"friendlyTypeName":"Damage","friendlySubtypeName":"Poison","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":2,"diceValue":12,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":"2d12"},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":16,"dice":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":12,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":0,"diceString":"1d12"},"value":null,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}},{"fixedValue":null,"id":"spell_78319_55690","entityId":null,"entityTypeId":null,"type":"damage","subType":"poison","dice":null,"restriction":"","statId":null,"requiresAttunement":false,"duration":null,"friendlyTypeName":"Damage","friendlySubtypeName":"Poison","isGranted":false,"bonusTypes":[],"value":null,"availableToMulticlass":null,"modifierTypeId":0,"modifierSubTypeId":0,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"die":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":6,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":null,"diceString":"1d6"},"count":1,"durationUnit":null,"usePrimaryStat":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[{"level":1,"typeId":16,"dice":{"diceCount":1,"diceValue":6,"diceMultiplier":null,"fixedValue":0,"diceString":"1d6"},"value":null,"details":""}],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]}}],"conditions":[{"type":1,"conditionId":11,"conditionDuration":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","exception":""}],"tags":["Damage","Combat"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"spellscale","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":60,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":10},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":5766052,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":710190,"definitionKey":"1118725998:710190","name":"Summon Ancestral Protector","level":1,"school":"Conjuration","duration":{"durationInterval":0,"durationUnit":null,"durationType":"Instantaneous"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

You bring into existence a being from another time and space. You summon a creature, which possesses extraplanar properties, and as a result is susceptible to banishment and any spells or abilities which affect extraplanar enemies.

\r\n

You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes a form you choose that fits your origin. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the familiar has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a aberration, celestial, fey, fiend or monstrosity (your choice) instead of a beast. The size of the form it can take and challenge rating increases with your character's level, consult the chart below and with your DM since some creature's might be too powerful or too big as a familiar.

\r\n

The time to cast the spell is increased by one hour per size increase of the creature.

\r\n

You may also mount your familiar if it has no fly speed, is at least one size larger than you, and has an appropriate anatomy that can serve as a mount. If you do so, you control the familiar in combat. While mounted on it, you can make any spell you cast that targets only you also target your familiar.

\r\n

Your familiar acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands. In combat, it rolls its own initiative and acts on its own turn. A familiar can't attack, but it can take other actions as normal. Starting at 10th level it can make 1 attack using your bonus action, at 15th level it becomes a free action. At 20th level it can make 2 attacks as a free action.

\r\n

When the familiar drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. At 5th level it has 1/2 the creatures normal hit points. At 10th level it has full hit points of the creature. At 15th level 1/4 of you hit points or its normal hit points which every is higher. At 20th level it has 1/4 plus 1 hit point for every character level.  It reappears after you cast this spell again. If it does so while you are mounted on it, you can use your reaction to dismount it as it disappears and land on your feet. Otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it.

\r\n

While your familiar is within 100 feet at 1st level, 125 at 5th, 150 at 10th, 175 at 15th and 200 at 20th. of you, you can communicate with it telepathically. Additionally, as an action, you can see through your familiar's eyes and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the familiar has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses. At 10th level, you can choose to use one sense of the familiar and keep the other, for example, you choose to see through the familiar and can still hear in your form but not through the familiar.

\r\n

As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. If you do so while you are mounted on it, you can use your reaction to dismount it as it disappears and land on your feet. Otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it. It disappears into a pocket dimension where it awaits your summons. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. Alternatively, you can dismiss it forever. As an action while it is temporarily dismissed, you can cause it to reappear in any unoccupied space within 30 feet of you. If your familiar loses hit points and is transported into the pocket dimension, the familiar regains 5 hit points for every hour it remains. Additionally any status effects or conditions that the familiar suffers from are cured if the familiar remains in the pocket dimension for the length of a long rest. Curses however remain, and cannot be cured in this way.

\r\n

You can't have more than one familiar at a time. If you cast this spell while you already have a familiar, you instead cause it to adopt a new form. Choose one of the forms from the list below. Your familiar transforms into the chosen creature. You may do so while mounted, as long as the new form also has no fly speed, is at least one size larger than you, and has an appropriate anatomy that can serve as a mount; otherwise, you are dismounted and fall prone in a space within 5 feet of it.

\r\n

Finally, when you cast a spell with a range of touch, your familiar can deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell. Your familiar must be within 100 feet of you,  at 1st level, 125 ft at 5th, 150 ft at 10th, 175 ft at 15th and 200 ft at 20th. and it must use its reaction to deliver the spell when you cast it. If the spell requires an attack roll, you use your attack modifier for the roll.

\r\n

20thHuge12Death Slaad, Gearkeeper Construct, Balhannoth, Behir, Chardalyn Dragon, Horned Devil, Nightmare Shepherd, Dao, Gray Render, Oinoloth, Arclight Phoenix, Aeorian Nullifier
","snippet":"","concentration":false,"ritual":true,"rangeArea":null,"damageEffect":null,"components":[1,2,3],"componentsDescription":"10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier","saveDcAbilityId":null,"healing":null,"healingDice":[],"tempHpDice":[],"attackType":null,"canCastAtHigherLevel":true,"isHomebrew":true,"version":"","sourceId":null,"sourcePageNumber":null,"requiresSavingThrow":false,"requiresAttackRoll":false,"atHigherLevels":{"higherLevelDefinitions":[],"additionalAttacks":[],"additionalTargets":[],"areaOfEffect":[],"duration":[],"creatures":[],"special":[],"points":[],"range":[]},"modifiers":[],"conditions":[],"tags":["Summoning"],"castingTimeDescription":"","scaleType":"characterlevel","sources":[],"spellGroups":[],"isLegacy":false},"definitionId":0,"prepared":true,"countsAsKnownSpell":true,"usesSpellSlot":true,"castAtLevel":null,"alwaysPrepared":false,"restriction":null,"spellCastingAbilityId":null,"displayAsAttack":null,"additionalDescription":null,"castOnlyAsRitual":false,"ritualCastingType":null,"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":10,"aoeType":null,"aoeValue":null},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":7},"baseLevelAtWill":false,"atWillLimitedUseLevel":null,"isSignatureSpell":null,"componentId":0,"componentTypeId":0,"spellListId":null},{"overrideSaveDc":null,"limitedUse":null,"id":138731,"entityTypeId":435869154,"definition":{"id":2254,"definitionKey":"1118725998:2254","name":"Sleep","level":1,"school":"Enchantment","duration":{"durationInterval":1,"durationUnit":"Minute","durationType":"Time"},"activation":{"activationTime":1,"activationType":1},"range":{"origin":"Ranged","rangeValue":90,"aoeType":"Sphere","aoeValue":20},"asPartOfWeaponAttack":false,"description":"

This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures).

\r\n

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell falls unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Subtract each creature’s hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature’s hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

\r\n

Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren’t affected by this spell.

\r\n

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.
